segments.text: How do I know when to tell EDD that have I started a new job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Work is work , whether it ’ s a part-time or temporary job or a full-time gig .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So I guess I have to report that I ’ Ve found a little bit of work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All you need to do is fill in the blanks correctly on the Continued Claim Form , and the EDD Office will take care of the rest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about if I find a job that I know will only last for a couple of weeks ? Can I take it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is to your advantage to work as much as you can .
segments.speaker: S2
